{"step_by_step_thinking": "DOPA and 5-Hydroxytryptophan are clinically important because they are acidic precursors of brain amines. DOPA is a precursor of dopamine, while 5-Hydroxytryptophan is a precursor of serotonin. These precursors are important in the synthesis of these neurotransmitters in the brain.", "answer_choice": "B"}
